name: Dina Katabi
content: Dina Katabi Dina Katabi Thuan and Nicole Pham Professor MacArthur Fellow Leader of Katabi Lab Director of the MIT Center for Wireless Networks and Mobile Computing MIT Computer Science & Artificial Intelligence Lab 32 Vassar Street, 32-G936 Cambridge, MA 02139 (617) 324-6027 dk@mit.edu Media and News [Full List] Research Digital Health New digital biomarkers and contactless health monitoring of patients with COVID, Parkinson's, Alzheimer's, etc. Wireless and Mobile System New sensors, algorithms, and systems that see through wall, improve data communications, and build the Internet of Things Machine Learning & Computer Vision Capturing the human pose, shape, and actions through walls and occlusions using custom neural models that operate on RF signals.
